title.rendered: Holiday Season: Check out the customer support schedule!

content.rendered:
The year 2015 was an amazing year and you, our customers and collaborators, have been there for us at every step! Thank you!

2015 in numbers: two news themes loved by 25000+ happy users, 28 updates with lots of new features, 14.000+ new customers, 34000+ new support forum posts, 11000+ hours dedicated to our clients and more than 4000 inspirational cups of

The Customer Support Schedule:

December 25 – 27, 2015 – tagDiv winter break
December 28 – 30, 2015 – 08.00 – 17.00 (GMT +2)
December 31, 2015 – Limited support
January 1 – 3, 2016 – Happy new year party! 🙂
January 4, 2016 – Back to normal!

If you find yourself working in the Holiday Season, you can drop us a line a on forum.tagdiv.com or contact@tagdiv.com. We’ll be happy to answer you when we get back on December 28 – 30 and January 4, 2016. You can also check out our extended documentation and video tutorials.

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
